title: India expects annual power output to grow at fastest in over a decade
description: India anticipates a 9.3% increase in power generation to 1,900 billion kWh by March 2025, the fastest growth since 2011/12. Factors include searing heatwaves, economic activity uptick, and projected above-average monsoon rains. Fossil fuel-fired power is expected to dominate, with coal and natural gas generation increasing.
